sources.title: The Atomic Submarine (1959) hunting alien vessel under ice | Vintage sci-fi
sources.description:
In the "not‑so‑distant future of 1968", ships cross the North Pole to move passengers and cargo, but a wave of vanishings brings traffic to a halt. With routes blocked by a strange vessel, Dan Wendover orders the specially equipped submarine Tiger Shark to investigate and pursue it beneath the ice. The intruder is piloted by a being from beyond Earth, whose mission forces the crew to make a decisive stand.

Title: The Atomic Submarine (1959)
Alternative title:s War of the Submarine / The Atomic sub

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/D--PwB9dwsM

Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet
Writers: Irving Block (story), Orville H. Hampton (screenplay)
Main cast: Arthur Franz, Dick Foran, Brett Halsey, Bob Steele, Joi Lansing

Genres: Science Fiction, Adventure, Thriller
Release date: November 29, 1959 
Budget: $135,000
Filming location: Los Angeles, California,

sources.title: The Atomic Submarine (1959)
sources.description: "The Atomic Submarine" is a 1959 American black-and-white science fiction film about an alien invasion that disrupts shipping in the Arctic. The story follows the crew of the atomic-powered USS Tigershark as they investigate the mysterious disappearances of ships and confront an underwater UFO.

sources.title: The Atomic Submarine 1959 colorized (Arthur Franz)
sources.description: When shipping starts mysteriously disappearing on routes across the Arctic Sea, a submarine is equipped with a special deep exploration device and sent to investigate. What they discover is an extraterrestrial craft, which may be too powerful for even their most sophisticated weapons. Arthur Franz as Lt. Cmdr. Richard 'Reef' Holloway Dick Foran as Cmdr. Dan Wendover Brett Halsey as Dr. Carl Neilson Jr. Tom Conway as Sir Ian Hunt Paul Dubov as Lt. David Milburn Bob Steele as CPO 'Grif' Griffin Victor Varconi as Dr. Clifford Kent Joi Lansing as Julie Sid Melton as Yeoman Chester Tuttle I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: In the far and distant future of 1968, many ships and planes are crossing the North pole to transport passengers and cargo. However lately more than eight ships and seven submarines have vanished mysteriously. The Tigershark is sent out to investigate their whereabouts and - if possible - remove the cause of their disappearance. But the life form Commander Vandover and his crew encounter may be too powerful even for their weapons of newest technology...
metadata.Writer: Orville H. Hampton, Irving Block, Jack Rabin
metadata.Actors: Arthur Franz, Dick Foran, Brett Halsey
